title: Outsourcing font building
content:
I am interested in having my vector designs turned into functioning fonts. I would like to outsource this part of the job though. The font I have designed is quite simple. I am hoping someone can direct me toward someone reputable. The fonts are odd and geometric, and wouldn't require pinpoint perfection.

No doubt this has been asked about before, but I wasn't able to find a thread. If so please drop me a link.

Thanks so much,

Russ
author: R-ss-ll
